 * http://lkcl.net
   ** Whole reason why we're here today
   ** Mitigates CSS Crap and HTML Hell
   ** Cool layout restructuring (down to 300px!)
 * http://worldfairtradeday09.org
   ** Django / Pyjamas / Joomla Integration
   ** Video, Document and Image upload/download
 * Party Live Online (yippee!)
   ** OSFlash / Red5 Integration
   ** Interactive games (!)
   ** Uses PostGIS for location search (cool)
   ** PostgresQL keels over (oops)
 * http://pyjs.org/showcase/Showcase.html
   ** really useful
   ** contains worked examples
 * auto-generated pyjamas app from doc strings
   ** http://lkcl.net/pyjamas-desktop/docs/output/docui.html
